name: Crossbows
description:
Two colors, two islands, two crossbows. Only one will be victorious.

Fight a long range crossbow battle in the middle of the ocean.

Controls Windows

Move your mouse to look around, left click to shoot and right click to aim.

Android

Drag on the screen to look around, tap the bolt button (on the left) to shoot and tap the scope button (on the right) to aim.
